message.content:
cs.LG, cs.CV, cs.AI, cs.CL, cs.NE 

This paper is likely to belong to the machine learning (cs.LG) sub-category as it proposes a metric learning algorithm that optimizes the performance of the kNN classifier. Additionally, the paper evaluates the algorithm's performance on synthetic and real datasets, which is a common practice in the machine learning community. The paper also mentions computer vision (cs.CV) as a potential application area for the proposed algorithm. The use of mathematical measures and optimization constraints suggests that the paper could also belong to the artificial intelligence (cs.AI) and computational linguistics (cs.CL) sub-categories. Finally, the weighting scheme used in the algorithm could be related to the neural and evolutionary computing (cs.NE) sub-category.
